title: Podcast: Reading the Signs
text:
Podcast: Reading the Signs Online Extras - PCT News Frank Fowler, vice president of McNeely Pest Control, Winston Salem, N.C., discusses how reading subtle signs can help PMPs solve challenging pest control problems. September 25, 2015 
By Brad Harbison 
Frank Fowler, vice president of McNeely Pest Control , Winston Salem, N.C., wrote the September PCT feature "Reading the Signs," which explores how reading subtle signs can help PMPs solve challenging pest control problems. 
Here from Fowler about this topic in the following podcast . Related Plaque Case Confirmed in New Mexico September 25, 2015
